n</script>（讲了这么多这个不可能不会自行理解吧），所以这个结论在上面讨论<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 9.498ex; height: 2.548ex; vertical-align: -0.695ex; margin: 1px 0px;" viewBox="-38.5 -819.5516853480245 4088.5555555555557 1102.103370696049"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#MJMATHI-70"></use><g transform="translate(781,0)"><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3C"></use><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="778" y="0"></use></g><g transform="translate(2616,0)"><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-221A" x="0" y="-62"></use><rect stroke="none" width="600" height="60" x="833" y="679"></rect><use xlink:href="#MJMATHI-6E" x="833" y="0"></use></g></g></svg></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-118">p<=\sqrt n</script>的时候已经证过了。所以，得证啦！</p><div class="md-section-divider"></div><p data-anchor-id="5gpy"><span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><div class="MathJax_SVG_Display" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true" style="text-align: center;"><span xlink:href="#MJCAL-51"></use><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-2E" x="817" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#MJCAL-45" x="1262" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-2E" x="1827" y="0"></use><use data-anchor-id="qa0k">综合上面两个结论，我们便可以得出整除分块的思路了：</p><ol data-anchor-id="n0xj">
<li><p>令<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 5.097ex; height: 1.622ex; vertical-align: -0.116ex; margin: 1px 0px;" viewBox="0 -687.0516853480245 2180.0555555555557 719.103370696049"><g stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#MJMATHI-69"></use><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-3D" x="623" y="0"></use><use xlink:href="#MJMAIN-31" x="1679" y="0"></use></g></svg></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-120">i=1</script></p></li>
<li><p>对于当前的<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 0.811ex; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 4.286ex; height: 1.969ex; vertical-align: -0.463ex; <li><p>通过前缀和或公式（例如等差数列公式）求得函数（<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 9.614ex; <li><p>我们已知<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" role="textbox" aria-readonly="true"><svg xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" style="width: 12.625ex; </ol><p data-anchor-id="vkcx">最终得到的<span class="MathJax_Preview"></span><span style="font-size: 100%; display: inline-block;" class="MathJax_SVG" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" role="textbox"
